entry.title: My first English blog
entry.content:
uhâ€¦.

I do not know what I can write about.

Because my English is not very good. But because of that, I will try to blog in English more than I would otherwise.

That would help improve my English.

I will be writing some computer technology articles here in English.

Because I like learning computer technology.

Such as C++ programming language, web front-end and other computer technology.

What do I know about computer technology? You can get it on my Github.
